question_text: How does a proxy server assist with content inspection without significantly affecting client performance?
answer_options: By caching frequently accessed content and scanning it once
By dynamically assigning static IPs to all users
By forwarding packets without examining headers
By routing all traffic through a firewall only
correct_answer: By caching frequently accessed content and scanning it once
explanation: Proxies can cache safe content to avoid redundant scanning, allowing fast access while still filtering new or suspicious content.
